name: Roll for Initiative (itch) (ozotojc, Griffin Dean)
description:
Made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam!

Controls:

WASD to move

LMB to shoot

Alt+f4 to quit

The d20s you shoot do random damage from 1-20! Try to get the highest score!

Programming done by GriffinDean

Art done by ozotojc

The VFX under the d20 pickup is not made by us. (Will find the asset pack author later, it is 3am)

BGM Credit goes to:

"Mega Hyper Ultrastorm" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
